LENGTH / RADIUS FOR SCREEN: {{doc.length_radius}}
DEPTH ( m ): {{doc.depthm}}

DATE OF TEST:{{doc.date_of_test}}

{%- for row in doc.fp_test -%} {%- endfor -%}
Test No. DY(Cm) Dh(Cm) Time(sec.) Time(sec.)
{{row.test_no}} {{row.dy_cm}} {{row.dh_cm}} {{row.time_sec}} {{row.k_cmsec}}

Remarks

{{doc.remarks}}

K = A / FT

Where

K = Coffeicent of permeability

F = 2 P L / ln (L/R) ( L = Length of screen , R = Radius of casing )

T = ( t2 - t1 ) / ln (H1 / H2) ( t1, t2 = Time in second , H1, H2 = Water level during test)


DY = Distance from top of casing to water level inside casing

Dh = Height of water above water table

Client:{{doc.client}}
name: Field Permeability Test
